answers.answer: Hello and hope you are fine.The exact cause can be confirmed only after I examine you. Pulled muscle, arm strain all can lead to weakness, severe pain and inability to lift arm. A sharp underarm pain that comes and goes can be the result of a muscle spasm or pleurisy. Pleurisy is usually caused by an infection and is most pronounced when you take a deep breath. Decreased motion of the shoulder joint can be due to diabetes mellitus, shoulder injury, hyperthyroidism etc.A clinical examination is must for correct diagnosis. Schedule an appointment with a doctor. Hope it helps.Best luck and take care!

question: my muscle around my right armpit has been hurting for about 1 year. it hurts when i lift my arm or use it. it doesnt seem to be healing. some days are worse than others.the pain can be sharp at times
title: muscle pain
